selections.name: Perfect Force
selections.reason: Showed excellent speed when finishing 2nd at this track and distance last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to lead or box seat. The one to beat.

selections.name: Moke Lake
selections.reason: Consistent performer who has placed in 2 of 3 starts this campaign. Handles the soft going and maps well.

selections.name: Bundoran
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Has placed first-up previously and drawn the rails to get a soft run.

selections.name: Go Russian
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at Newcastle two starts back. Disappointed last time but can bounce back in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Moke Lake
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and race-fit, likely to be right in the finish if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Eagleturn
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid 4th at Wyong in better grade. Strips fitter here and drawn barrier 1. Looks the class runner.

selections.name: Olympian
selections.reason: First starter by The Autumn Sun. Won a trial at Muswellbrook leading into this. Stable strikes well with debutants.

selections.name: Currumbin Alley
selections.reason: Resuming. Placed in a Super Maiden at Dubbo last prep. Has ability and trials have been okay.

selections.name: Morpeth
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 3rd on a heavy track last start. Soft conditions suit and drawn well.

danger_horse.name: Olympian
danger_horse.reason: Well-bred debutant from a top stable with a trial win.

selections.name: Splash Of Steel
selections.reason: Strong form lines including a 2nd at the Gold Coast Magic Millions maiden. Drops back to country grade and looks superior.

selections.name: Scoop The Pool
selections.reason: Resuming for the O'Shea/Charlton yard. Won a recent trial and has contested much stronger races in the city.

selections.name: Pappa Blue (NZ)
selections.reason: Just missed when 2nd at Canberra last start. Ideally drawn in barrier 1 to go one better.

selections.name: Be More Pacific
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed glimpses of ability last prep and recent trials have been fair.

danger_horse.name: Scoop The Pool
danger_horse.reason: City class horse resuming in a country maiden. Big watch.

selections.name: Are You Kidding
selections.reason: Dominant 5.5L winner last start on heavy ground. Progressive type who should handle the rise in grade easily.

selections.name: Roses Imminente
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Highway Handicaps. Drawn the rail and maps to get a lovely run.

selections.name: Damascus Gate
selections.reason: Last start winner at Muswellbrook. tough on pace runner who handles wet tracks well.

selections.name: Grandini
selections.reason: Consistent mare who rarely runs a bad race. Drawn well and stays in the mix.

selections.name: Glenbower
selections.reason: Drops in class after a solid 6th in a Class 2. Ratings suggest he is well placed here despite the weight.

selections.name: Madame Fiocca
selections.reason: Triple Crown runner who maps well from barrier 3. Forgive last start, previous form was solid.

selections.name: Yacht Girl
selections.reason: Consistent type who finished 2nd last start. Will be running on late.

selections.name: Fast Blue
selections.reason: Racing in good form with a 2nd and 3rd recently. Drawn to get a soft run.

danger_horse.name: Madame Fiocca
danger_horse.reason: Capable of sharp improvement from a good draw.

selections.name: Into Brooklyn
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden impressively before a spell. Trial winner leading in. Looks ready to go.

selections.name: Solar Blast
selections.reason: Resuming. Has contested much stronger races in SA. If ready, he outclasses this field.

selections.name: Yes Yes Boss
selections.reason: Consistent mare who is rarely far away. Good each-way value.

selections.name: Catchy Tunes
selections.reason: Drawn the rail. Will need luck but has the ability to feature.

danger_horse.name: Solar Blast
danger_horse.reason: Class runner resuming. Watch betting moves.

selections.name: Vierville
selections.reason: Won well at this track last start. Stays in the same grade and maps to be competitive again.

selections.name: Blend Of Three
selections.reason: Resuming. Has performed well in Highway company. Trial winner leading in.

selections.name: Lightning Speed
selections.reason: Chased hard for 2nd last start. Fit and ready to peak.

selections.name: Favour The Bold
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good fresh record and drawn well.

danger_horse.name: Blend Of Three
danger_horse.reason: Highway form stacks up well here.
